inputs.content: {the suspected beard} was facial hair
the length of the suspected beard was >= 5 millimetres
the suspected beard occurred on or below the chin

outputs.content: the suspected beard was a beard
outputs.name: the fact that the facial hair was a beard

enactments.exact: In this Act, beard means any facial hair no shorter than 5 millimetres in length that: occurs on or below the chin

inputs.content: {the suspected beard} was facial hair
the length of the suspected beard was >= 5 millimetres
the suspected beard existed in an uninterrupted line from the front of one ear to the front of the other ear below the nose

outputs.content: the suspected beard was a beard
outputs.name: the fact that the facial hair was a beard

selection.exact: In this Act, beard means any facial hair no shorter than 5 millimetres in length that:
exists in an uninterrupted line from the front of one ear to the front of the other ear below the nose.

inputs: the fact that the facial hair was a beard

inputs.content: {the defendant} wore the suspected beard
inputs.name: the defendant's act of wearing the suspected beard

inputs.content: the office of {the Department of Beards} granted an exemption authorizing the defendant's act of wearing the suspected beard

outputs.content: {the defendant} committed the offense of wearing of a beard without exemption
outputs.name: offense of wearing a beard without exemption

inputs.content: the Department of Beards granted an exemption authorizing the defendant's act of wearing the suspected beard
inputs.name: the Department of Beards granted the defendant's beard exemption

outputs.content: the Department of Beards granted an exemption from the prohibition of wearing beards

inputs.statement: the Department of Beards granted the defendant's beard exemption
inputs.name: the defendant's beardcoin

outputs.to_effect: the Department of Beards granted the defendant's beard exemption

inputs.content: {the beardcoin transaction} was {the defendant}'s purchase of {any beardcoin} from {the counterparty}

statement.content: the Department of Beards granted an exemption from the prohibition of wearing beards
statement.name: the Department of Beards granted a beard exemption

outputs.content: the beardcoin transaction was a transfer of beardcoin between the defendant and the counterparty
outputs.name: beardcoin transfer

inputs.content: the beardcoin transaction was the counterparty's purchase of any beardcoin from the defendant
the beardcoin transaction was the defendant's loan of any beardcoin to the counterparty
the beardcoin transaction was the defendant's lease of any beardcoin to the counterparty
the beardcoin transaction was the defendant's gift of any beardcoin to the counterparty
the beardcoin transaction was the defendant's receipt of any beardcoin from the counterparty
the beardcoin transaction was a licensed beardcoin repurchase
the counterparty was the Department of Beards

outputs.content: the defendant committed the offense of improper transfer of beardcoin

inputs.content: the defendant produced, altered, or manufactured tokens with the appearance of and purporting to be genuine beardcoin

outputs.content: the defendant committed the offense of counterfeiting beardcoin

inputs.content: the beardcoin transaction was {the barber}'s purchase of any beardcoin from {the customer}
the barber removed the customer's beard with barbering, hairdressing, or other male grooming services
the Department of Beards licensed the barber to purchase beardcoins from customers

outputs.content: the beardcoin transaction was a licensed beardcoin repurchase
